title: Vayne's new skin
body: Just wondering if riot will ever make another new skin for Vayne. It will be a great idea because Vayne don't have a REAL new skin. What i'm saying is that Vayne had her new skin because SKT T1 won the championship. Vayne's real new skin would be cool because right now even her new skin is not available anymore(the SKT T1).A new skin like this Bat-Vayne skin for 1350 or this Mass Effection for 3250(Ultimate skin like Ezreal)would be great.Sorry for my bad English, but i hope you get what i'm saying.

replies.body:
Mass Effection Vayne looks fucking epic.

*Gets on my knees* Please Riot, bestow this skin of awesome upon us.
I NEED IT IN MY LIFE
I'll do the same thing. PLEASE Riot begging all of you!
She also looks like a Ghost (Starcraft).
i love the idea of a pulsefire-like vayne. cmon reto!
Love the Mass Effect / Pulsefire Vayne concept. :)

Guys, may I get an answer from Riots at least in one of my threads too? I'm really curious about my skin ideas. 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-skins/WEAZBwlW-dark-gravitation-karma-skin-evilbad-karma
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-skins/ljxiUYkf-cursed-blade-yasuo-skin-concept

Really guys? Just post your stuff, and let the discussion happen. Don't go looking for reds to throw your ideas at. You'll drive them away from the boards, lowering your chance of them seeing your stuff anyways.

No, the up-voting system is practically worthless.  The discussions at the top happen at the random whims of the raging kid population.  Has nothing to do with someone's point being intelligent, insightful, valid, or even worth reading.  Can't blame the guy for trying to get his idea noticed in this madness of a forum :P

I have seen plenty of solid points get the attention they deserve, and have moved to the top of the pile on their merit alone.  If his post is worthwhile, a red will see it, and will pass it along to the red(s) that can best contribute. If you really want a full in depth analysis of why you're not getting the attention you want, go to this discussion here. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/F2fWRIly-what-makes-riot-notice-a-thread?comment=0000000200000000

No matter what, don't go looking for reds on someone else's board, and start throwing your ideas at them. As said before, if you want reds to keep responding, don't make them regret ever showing their heads.
I Agree!
Harsh. I'd also like to point out that this isn't the place to have this conversation. Take it to his linked post. Don't clutter the good OP's board.

Yup
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-skins/NsnJYLlG-new-ezreal-skin

Really guys? Just post your stuff, and let the discussion happen. Don't go looking for reds to throw your ideas at. You'll drive them away from the boards, lowering your chance of them seeing your stuff anyways.

I'm sorry, I've been waiting for their answer about 5 months XD

I have seen plenty of solid points get the attention they deserve, and have moved to the top of the pile on their merit alone. If your post is worthwhile, a red will see it, and will pass it along to the red(s) that can best contribute. If you really want a full in depth analysis of why you're not getting the attention you want, go to this discussion here.

No matter what, don't go looking for reds on someone else's board, and start throwing your ideas at them. As said before, if you want reds to keep responding, don't make them regret ever showing their heads.

Thank You I hope the people who make skins think about this concept because I have a feeling that many players will love this skin. I'll wait for this skin to show up.I'll wait for years if it's necessary. :D

Oh. My. God.
Pulsefire Vayne PLS. I haven't paid for any skin over a 1350 (Don't even own a 1350 I'm pretty sure) however I would buy that PF Vayne 4 times.
RITO PLS
{{champion:67}}

I'd totally get Vayne if she had that Pulsefire skin. Though I'm more afraid of people complaining about the skin-tight nature of the skin and forcing the design to change to something boring and unlikable.

Ok this is just me thinking here....But what if it is instead called Pulsefire Vayne, call it like Elite Squad Vayne and change the colors into like black and red or some types of dark colors. Pulsefire is ezeral thing and it suits him perfectly. Vayne she hunts at night time, so I could see the skin being legit. I like it though!!!! :D Bat Vayne looks cool too. RIOT PLS {{item:3151}}
I like your idea because Vayne's lore is awful its all about darkness and stuff. So I think it is a good idea! Riot PLEASE!
ok at the time of this post this thread has a ward icon next to it, @Riot or someone who knows, what does that mean?
It means there's a Picture in the OP
cool ty <3
Thanks For all the comment i guess riot will never notice this post again :(
out of curiousity, was there any contemplation on copyright infringement?

Cyberbutt Vayne?  Lets not turn Vayne into fanservice guys.  She's one of the more conservatively clothed female champions in the game, and I'd prefer to keep the whiteknights from having an excuse to complain.  I'm still scratching my head on why Riot gave SKT T1 Vayne a boobjob in her splash art.
Actually the first thing i noticed was her eyes and weapons. If you're playing League of Legends while using this skin i think u won't even notice her butt.

I'm pretty sure that was Rito's logic for frostbutt Irelia too. I don't mind fan service, I could zoom in on Nidalee all day, but let's try to  keep a champ with a more tragic backstory with as few "sexy" skins as possible.  Heartseeker is already pushing it .
I love the dragoon costume
